QuestData.Title: The Real Big Race
QuestData.Description:
Here's the big one! Good luck out there!
This race has four legs: get to the purple post, then green, then red, then back here.
Your time matters, so do it fast!
QuestData.LogDescription: Run through the Start Banner, hit the Purple Post, then the Green Post, then the Red Post, then the return to the Start Banner.

Objectives.Objective: Enter the Start Banner with a Darkmoon Game Token
